rules_text: When Ariessa enters, add two 8/8 blue Kraken creature tokens to your bestiary. [i](If you would create a creature token, you may instead play one from your bestiary.)[/i]
special_text:
First mate–Your starting deck contains at least eight cards that create tokens. [i](If this card outside the game is your chosen first mate, you may swap it with a card in your opening hand.)[/i]
When Ariessa enters, add two 8/8 blue Kraken creature tokens to your bestiary. [i](If you would create a creature token, you may instead play one from your bestiary.)[/i]
